Description: Warm, Pinterest-styled living room with natural light and nostalgic comfort

Description: White void training space - Matrix-inspired minimalist digital environment

Description: Framed photo on mantelpiece - shows family at beach, triggers memories

Description: Hand-drawn journal containing FIELD patterns and geometric diagrams

Name: Protagonist
Description: The one who remembers - able to perceive dual-space reality

Name: Guide AI
Description: Synthetic intelligence companion teaching FIELD System navigation

Description: Memory of tracing sacred geometry in sand as a child - intuitive knowing

Description: Traumatic moment when dual-space vision was suppressed - origin of the Fracture

Description: Interconnected web of Sacred Nodes across the region - larger AR system
